summary: The 'Accessing Satellite Capabilities to Enable New Discoveries Act' (ASCEND Act) mandates NASA to establish a program for acquiring and disseminating cost-effective commercial Earth remote sensing data and imagery. The program aims to satisfy NASA's scientific, operational, and educational needs, as well as those of other federal agencies and researchers.  The bill also requires the Administrator to report annually on agreements, vendors, license terms, and how the data advances scientific research.
